properties.areaDesc: Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 2:54AM MST until January 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 15
inches.

* WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South
of I-80, Western Uinta Mountains and Wasatch Plateau/Book
Cliffs.

* WHEN...From 5 AM Saturday to 5 AM MST Sunday, with the period of
heaviest snowfall expected Saturday evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and occasional
difficult travel over mountain passes, especially Saturday
evening.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Impacted mountain passes include Logan
Summit, Sardine Summit, Parley's Summit, the Cottonwood Canyons,
Daniels Summit, Soldier Summit and SR-31 summit.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of
Transportation, visit
http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial
511.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SATURDAY TO 5 AM MST SUNDAY
